text: The other day I was in the shower
playing Wii bowling when I got a random
knock on the door. I went to go check
who it was, but there was nobody there.
Just a box that said, "Don't open." So,
I shut the door to keep playing when I
heard another knock on the door [music]
and now it says, "Okay, fine. You can
open it." So, I took the box and opened
it up. But I could not believe what was
inside. A clarinet with coordinates
taped to it. I got in the car and
started [music] driving to these
coordinates. When I got there, there was
a paper that said, "Play these notes."
I played them and this chest just opened
up. I went to grab the candy inside, but
when I did, this guy brought out an iPad
[music] for me to tip. He's clearly
trying to scam me, so I just walked into
the Whole Foods instead. I grabbed two
bags of Joyide and checked out. Beware
of scammers. You enjoy right at Whole
Foods.
